import api from'./api';export const adminService={// Login
login:credentials=>{return api.post('/admin/login',credentials);},// Dashboard
getDashboardStats:()=>{return api.get('/admin/dashboard');},// Customers
getAllCustomers:function(){let includeBlocked=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:false;return api.get("/admin/customers?includeBlocked=".concat(includeBlocked));},blacklistCustomer:(customerId,reason)=>{return api.put("/admin/blacklist-customer/".concat(customerId),{reason});},unblockCustomer:customerId=>{return api.put("/admin/unblock-customer/".concat(customerId));},// Sellers
getAllSellers:function(){let includeBlocked=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:false;return api.get("/admin/sellers?includeBlocked=".concat(includeBlocked));},blacklistSeller:(sellerId,reason)=>{return api.put("/admin/blacklist-seller/".concat(sellerId),{reason});},unblockSeller:sellerId=>{return api.put("/admin/unblock-seller/".concat(sellerId));},// Blocked Users
getBlockedUsers:()=>{return api.get('/admin/blocked-users');}};
